name: Tau Flight
description:
Tau Flight is a 3D, fast paced, space combat game.

There are currently two game modes:

  • Battle - a free for all
  • Team Battle - lead your team to victory!

The game was designed for a gamepad, but should also be compatible with other controllers (e.g. flight sticks).  The controls are configurable.

This game is currently version 0.1.  More content is planned.
